reviews.text: 2761 N Hwy 77 Suite 120, Waxahachie, TX 75165 “We had MINT Exteriors replace our roof after a bad spring wind storm. They worked with us, along with our insurance company to make the process less stressful. I would especially recommend Nate Odom, our salesperson. Nate was always very responsive and professional throughout the whole process. I would recommend MINT for shingle replacement on your home, great local company who takes pride in their business.” – Eric Dawson
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"The work looks quality and it was finished quickly." "I have since received several compliments on the style & new roof color." "Great service, great staff, would recommend."
